Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Belle Plaine
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Irving Park, Southport and Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Belle Plaine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Irving Park, Southport and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Belle Plaine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Clark/Belle Plaine
ShortDescription: Northbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Irving Park, Southport, Clark, Montrose and Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Irving Park, Southport, Clark, Montrose and Ashland due to street blockage near Clark/Belle Plaine.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/42nd
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 43rd, Wallace, 35th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/42nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 43rd, Wallace, 35th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/42nd.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
